Description: Used in ctrlWidgetPicker.js used in form designer.

Widgets.Name: Row-Block-Titled
Widgets.Caption: Row Block with Title
Widgets.Description: A full width row with a block title and internal row with two columns.
Widgets.Why-force-re-edit-mode: Because when we insert some HTML, it renders without editable widgets. This forces save/edit mode change.

Widgets.Name: Column-Block-Titled
Widgets.Caption: Column Block with Title
Widgets.Description: A full width column with a block title and internal row with two columns.
Widgets.Reason-for-hiding: Because the 3rd party editor gets confused.
Widgets.Why-force-re-edit-mode: Because when we insert some HTML, it renders without editable widgets. This forces save/edit mode change.

Widgets.Name: Field-Label
Widgets.Caption: Field Label
Widgets.Description: When adding a field, this label is often placed to a column on the left of the field.
